name: Second Nature Healthy Habits Ltd
description: Provider of a lifestyle improvement program intended to inspire, educate and support those at risk of chronic lifestyle diseases. The company offers personalized programs developed by dietitians and psychologists and provides ongoing one-on-one support from a nutritionist that people need to prevent diabetes by using a smart plan, enabling individuals to improve their mood, sleep, and energy levels while losing weight.
